### About me

::: {#hero-heading}
I am a optical and radar remote sensing enthusiast. My main research interest focuses on using geodetic remote sensing for studying groundwater dynamics in the aquifers. The long term goal of mine is to be in the forefront of Hydrogeodesy research.
